attributes.action: honour Trina Gulliver with an OBE for services to darts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Trina has never trully been recognised as one of the true greats in darts .
anyone who wins 7 world titles in a row deserves some recognision

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
